request.description: Signs in a user with provided credentials, consisting of an email address and a password. Make sure to serve your website over HTTPS, as user credentials are sent in clear-text along with the body on this request. The response body consists of a status flag and an auth token. The response also includes a cookie that holds the auth token and is valid for 30 days.

Signs out a user by invalidating the auth cookie. The response body consits of a status flag and empty data. The response also includes an expired cookie with no token info, which renders it invalid for future requests to protected API endpoints.

header.value: token=none; Path=/; Expires=Wed, 15 Jul 2020 07:06:43 GMT; HttpOnly

request.description: Creates a new user with provided credentials, consisting of an email address and a password. The email address has to be unique, that is, must not be used by an existing user. The password has to be at least 6 characters long. Make sure to serve your website over HTTPS, as user credentials are sent in clear-text along with the body on this request. The response body consists of a status flag and empty data.

response.name: Failure - Short password

item.name: Password

request.description: Updates user password based on given credentials, consisting of current password and new password. This endpoint is protected and requires a valid auth token. Make sure to serve your website over HTTPS, as user credentials are sent in clear-text along with the body on this request. The response body consists of a status flag and an auth token. The response also includes a cookie that holds the auth token and is valid for 30 days.

response.name: Failure - Unauthorized
Failure - Wrong token
Failure - Short password

request.description: Sends a reset password email to the user with the provided email address. The email contains a link with a reset token that is valid for 10 mins. The response body consists of a status flag and empty data.

response.name: Failure - Wrong email

request.description: Updates a user's password with the provided one. This endpoint is protected by a valid reset token as part of the route. Make sure to serve your website over HTTPS, as the password is sent in clear-text along with the body on this request. The response body consists of a status flag and an auth token. The response also includes a cookie that holds the auth token and is valid for 30 days.

response.name: Failure - Short password

item.description: Provide basic user password management services. This includes updating and resettings the password. The latter is used in case the use has forgotten the password.

item.name: Search

request.description: Searches the surface and the dark webs for cryptocurrency related content. This endpoint is protected and requires a valid auth token. The response body consists of a status flag, results count, pagination info, and data consisting of a list of search results.

response.name: Failure - Unauthorized

item.description: Provides advacned search services from cryptocurrency related sources.

item.name: Feedbacks

request.description: Gets all feedbacks provided by the signed-in user. This endpoint is protected and requires a valid auth token. The response body consists of a status flag, results count, pagination info, and data consisting of a list of user feedbacks.

response.name: Failure - Unauthorized

request.description: Adds a new feedback for the signed-in user. The feedback must contain a valid category and optional comments. This endpoint is protected and requires a valid auth token. The response body consists of a status flag and data representing the newly created feedback.

response.name: Failure - Unauthorized
Failure - Invalid category

item.description: Provides partial CRUD routes for user feedback.

response.name: Failure - Invalid frequency

request.description: Removes account info for the signed-in user. This includes other user-made content, such as alerts, feedbacks, and tags. This endpoint is protected and requires a valid auth token. The response body consists of a status flag and empty data.

item.description: Provides partial CRUD routes for the signed-in user. This inlcudes account info, alerts, feedbacks, and tags.
